changeSet.comment: create Endowment related parameters in RICE tables Step 2

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The creation of a new KEMID value will be dependent upon the institutional parameter chosen for the KEMID value: � IF the parameter is Automatic

column.name: CONS_CD
column.value: each KEMID initiated will be sequentially numbered by the system based on a database sequence and beginning with the value the sequence has been configured to start with. � IF the parameter is Manual

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The value of this parameter is used to map the Liabilities EndowmentTransactionType to the Liabilities code defined in BasicAccountingCategory.

changeSet.author: Bonnie

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The value of this parameter is used to map the Income EndowmentTransactionType to the Income code defined in BasicAccountingCategory.

changeSet.author: Bonnie

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The value of this parameter is used to map the Expense EndowmentTransactionType to the Expenses code defined in BasicAccountingCategory.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The value of this parameter is used to map the Asset EndowmentTransactionType to the Assets code defined in BasicAccountingCategory.

changeSet.comment: create Endowment related parameters in RICE tables Step 2

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The number of times per year that the institution will distribute income to the account holders.
